fig = plt.figure(figsize = (15, 4))
sns.set_theme()
sns.barplot(x=Year,y = Disaster_count)
plt.xlabel("Year",fontweight = 'bold')
plt.ylabel("No. of Disasters",fontweight = 'bold')
plt.title("Disasters per year",fontweight = 'bold')
plt.xticks(rotation=60)
plt.show()

CONTENT:

# In this dataset we look into the differents type of Disasters happend in india 1990 to 2021. * **Title** - Name of the disasters. * **Duration** - time of disasters was happend from day to month. * **Year** - Disasters happing year * **Disasters_Info** - All information about Disasters. * **Date** - Date (yy-mm-dd)
